document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#50748c">Bells </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff88a2">Steeples </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff88a2">stand </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff88a2">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#2cff7c">swollen </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff9484">Sky </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#705cff">leap </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98e8ff">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#705cff">silver </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98e8ff">Feet </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98e8ff">frantic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#705cff">Melody! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
